column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I have to say it up front
column2: I love the speakeasy atmosphere.  Seems the chicago steakhouses all have distinct personalities.  This time tho
column3: it felt like we had a creepy busser
column4: adding to the "there's a murder about to happen" vibe from a 30's mystery movie.  I expected a woman's scream
column6: and someone yelling to lock the doors as the suspect responsible for the untimely demise of baron von something must still be inside.
